response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value for us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $14,500. This price reflects a strategic negotiation while still allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
